page.title: 20RELIGION-EYNSFORD FARNINGHAM
page.content: Our parish churches of Eynsford and Farningham share the same rector, the Rev.D.Sweetman. Parishioners enjoy family services, prayer, discussion and a magazine. Anthony Roper school is lucky because Rev.Sweetman is their chairman of governors. He takes an active role in the school,takes assemblies and lends an ear to children and adults who want to talk to him. The minister from Eynsford Baptist Church also comes to our school. His church has activities for age groups throughout the week. A youth club ends its activities with the minister speaking to them each Friday. There is a mid-week service, house groups meet for discussion and prayer. Services are informal, Sunday evening is a time for sharing of fellowship and love.
